QuestData.Title: A Little Side Action
QuestData.Description:
'Ey, $n, I could be usin' yer talents fer a little bet I got goin' on with Usha.
I'm wagerin' you can beat up five 'o her pals around the island before her dog can beat up five o' ours.
Ye up fer it me $ulad:lass;? 'O course ya are, ahahaha!
